title: Tamberlin's Account
description: She may be the last living person in a world full of undead. All she wants is to be remembered... and to stay alive. Read a firsthand account of the zombie apocalypse through the pages of Tamberlin's journal and get lost in an intimate and unflinching portrait of an ordinary woman determined to live in a world where there's little left to live for. If you want a fast paced, over the top, action story, you're looking in the wrong place. For those who are looking for a very human, philosophical, and psychological dystopian journey - you will believe every step you take with Tamberlin. Living with a haunting past and a bleak future - it's easy to wonder if such a life is worth what it's going to take to hold on to it. READ HER DIARY, LIVE THE NIGHTMARE
author: Jaime Munt
